thread.title: Comment on I have no idea what Peyton Siva’s dad just said, but I think he wants sex by Kyle
thread.title_full: Comment on I have no idea what Peyton Siva’s dad just said, but I think he wants sex by Kyle

author: Kyle
title: Comment on I have no idea what Peyton Siva’s dad just said, but I think he wants sex by Kyle
text:
Peyton Siva Sr. wrote a Facebook status that I’ve tried to read several times now. All I really take away from it is he wants sex and he doesn’t like ESPN. 
See what you can get out of this… 
Well good luck with the sex, Papa Siva. Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 14 responses to “I have no idea what Peyton Siva’s dad just said, but I think he wants sex” BETH October 22, 2015 at 11:27 am | Permalink | Reply 
WHAT THE HELL???? October 22, 2015 at 11:27 am | Permalink | Reply 
What the hell is wrong with people? Spoken from a true Louisville man asdf October 22, 2015 at 11:27 am | Permalink | Reply 
Prosecution’s Exhibit # 1 for the case that texting and twitter shorthand is destroying our ability to communicate. UofLOL October 22, 2015 at 11:28 am | Permalink | Reply 
These are the parents that let their children go to louisville Mathlete October 22, 2015 at 11:31 am | Permalink 
Having seen the musings of UL graduates, their kids aren’t much better when they get out. Realme October 22, 2015 at 11:29 am | Permalink | Reply 
Uh… Wut? Blue October 22, 2015 at 11:32 am | Permalink | Reply 
Everything about this disgusts me. From the horrendous grammar, spelling, and lack of punctuation, to the actual message he attempted to convey (from what I could decipher, anyway). As another comment already pointed out…This type of short-hand texting/social media typing is destroying communication as we know it. It isn’t difficult to type an extra letter or two. Echo1 October 22, 2015 at 11:32 am | Permalink | Reply 
Can any “student” athlete or parent associated with UL basketball form a coherent sentence? WOW October 22, 2015 at 11:33 am | Permalink | Reply 
I don’t always read Facebook posts, but when I do I make sure it’s from a Louisville Man, so I can feel like the smartest person in the world. What a complete moron, the more the Loserville fans, parents, and players talk, the dumber they sound. Maybe they need to teach and English 101 class at lville for students and parents. Allison October 22, 2015 at 11:34 am | Permalink | Reply 
I love how so many Louisville fans are STILL in denial about what’s happening in their program. I don’t know how anyone could deny that it happened at this point, but some still are. Bless their little Cards-loving hearts… Andy October 22, 2015 at 11:35 am | Permalink | Reply 
He’s not paying for sex…..don’t worry Pitino will pay for it Dude October 22, 2015 at 11:35 am | Permalink | Reply 
Man, the jokes just keep writing themselves… #iStandWithLouisville October 22, 2015 at 11:35 am | Permalink | Reply 
Keep your mouth shut, and people think you are an idiot. Open mouth and remove all doubt. 
#L1CWHORE October 22, 2015 at 11:35 am | Permalink | Reply 
Wow. Just…wow.
